name: Music Tab (alpha)
description:
It's my Final Project for Introduction of Game Engines lecture. I designed the game as mobile game but I had to present as PC game so, some features are not proper for Mobil. Lastly, Play the game Landscape mode and with earphone.

Ps: If you can give feedback I will be thankfull :)
